CustomField.description: Number of people in the candidate's household. Captured for eligibility determination. No automatic calculation - just data capture for review. Enter a whole number (e.g., 1, 2, 3, 4).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the total number of people in the candidate's household (e.g., 1, 2, 3, 4). This is used for eligibility determination and program capacity planning. Enter a whole number only.
CustomField.label: Household Size
